channel.title: GeoGebra on Eric McKinney
channel.description: Recent content in GeoGebra on Eric McKinney

item.title: Law of Large Numbers Applet
item.description: This applet shows the proportion (relative frequency) of heads when flipping a fair coin. As the number of coins increases the long term relative frequency will approach 0.5 (the expected value).

item.title: Binomial Distribution Applet
item.description: This applet allows the user to specify the parameters of a binomial distribution, and calculate the probability of a specific outcome.

item.title: Histogram Applet
item.description: This is an applet that allows the user to adjust the bin width of a histogram.
